acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped byte values with @PodamByteValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleByteValuesWithThePodamByteValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ByteValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the byte value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the byte value 97 should be lower or equal to 100
Then the byte value 60 should be between 0 and 100
Then the Object should not be null
Then the byte value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the byte value 66 should be lower or equal to 100
Then the Object should not be null
Then the byte value 88 should be between 0 and 100
The byte value 12 should be precisely 12
